meaning_str.bing:
v. 报告；报道；汇报；举报
n. 报告；报道；汇报；调查报告
网络. 报表；报导；传说

报告；报道；汇报；调查报告

报告；汇报；报道；告知；通报；揭发；告发；举报；据报道；传达；宣布；诉说；描述；发表；公布；报到；据说；传闻
报告；报道；汇报；传说；传闻；<英>（学生）成绩报告单；<法律>案情报告；<正式>爆炸声；<古>名誉

1.en: The report immediately raised the question of whether the same technique could be used to clone people.
1.cn: 这个报告立即提出了是否同样技术也可以用于克隆人的问题。

2.en: China, says the report, "does not appear to have broadened its concept of operations" to encompass sea control in waters beyond Taiwan.
2.cn: 报告说，中国“似乎并未将军事演习范围拓宽”至台海以外。

3.en: Campaigners welcomed the publication of the report, calling it the only real attempt to reveal the full scale of the tragedy.
3.cn: 社会活动人士对报告的发行表示欢迎，称之为揭开悲剧全景的唯一真正尝试。

0.en: I was coming to report to you.

1.en: There's no need. I wrote the report.
1.cn: 没这个必要。报告是我写的。

2.en: General, the reconnaissance report on the enemy base is coming.
2.cn: 长官，侦查兵报告敌军来袭。

3.en: Learn all you can about them and report back.
3.cn: 学习你们能学到的关于他们的一切，回来做报告。

4.en: You know, like, okay: Could that report be any later?
4.cn: 对，比如这样，报告要“何时”才能交来?。

5.en: The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.
5.cn: 斯纳普的侦察飞行器传来的扫描数据证实了芬恩的报告。

6.en: Did you write the report? No. No. We all discussed what to say. We all wrote it together. She wrote. She wrote the report. She was in charge. Is that true? No.
6.cn: 这报告是你写的吗？不，不，我们一起讨论了报告该怎么写。然后所有人一起写的。她写的报告，她是主管。

7.en: Your Honor, we withdraw our medical report on the offender's physical condition and stipulate to the truth of the plaintiff's report.
7.cn: 法官大人，我们撤回对犯罪人的身体健康评估报告，承认原告报告的真实性。

8.en: This is the SS report. You all have copies. This is report which was written, approved and signed by all of you immediately after the event.
8.cn: 这是党卫军的报告。你们都有复印件。这份报告在事故发生后不久由你们共同撰写、同意和签署。

9.en: I'll have the report out tomorrow. We don't want to wait.
9.cn: 我明天就会给出报告的。我们不想等。

10.en: All right. Get me a copy and report on the investigation so far.
10.cn: 好吧，给我弄一份目前为止的调查报告。

11.en: All of which you know, if your friend read you the report.
11.cn: 这一切你都知道，只要你的朋友给你读了报告。

12.en: You will visit the 1960s and give a report. Time travel.
12.cn: 你们要参观二十世纪六十年代，并做出报告。穿越时空之旅。

13.en: What's this? My bug report to you. Well, that's quite a list you got there.
13.cn: 这是什么？我记录你的问题报告。这表列得还挺长的嘛。

14.en: After seeing this report, she said she wouldn't sell anything that was gonna hurt people.
14.cn: 读了这份报告之后她说她不会出售害人的东西。

15.en: Good. 'Cause I've got a product report to read, it's like eight pages, I hope I don't fall asleep.
15.cn: 好，我要看报告有八页，但愿我不会睡着。

16.en: All in the police report. Rachel Posner was at the hotel that night.
16.cn: 都在警方报告里。Rachel Posner当晚也在那家酒店里。

17.en: But yesterday, yesterday's jobs report was another reminder of how far we've come.
17.cn: 昨晚公布的就业发展报告显示，我们取得了巨大的成就。

18.en: Autopsy report says the gun was fired at close range, possibly pressed up against her temple.
18.cn: 尸检报告说开枪距离很近，很可能是杵着太阳穴的

19.en: He's bringing me the police report on Russo's suicide. I'll press him for more.
19.cn: 他会把Russo自杀的警方报告拿给我，我尽量多套些信息。
